documenttitle.text: Red Hat Bug Fix Advisory: OpenShift Container Platform 4.10.26 extras update

note.text:
Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform release 4.10.26 is now available with
updates to packages and images that fix several bugs.
note.title: Topic

note.text:
Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform is Red Hat's cloud computing
Kubernetes application platform solution designed for on-premise or private
cloud deployments.

This advisory contains the RPM packages for Red Hat OpenShift Container
Platform 4.10.26. See the following advisory for the container images for
this release:

https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2022:5875

All OpenShift Container Platform 4.10 users are advised to upgrade to these
updated packages and images when they are available in the appropriate
release channel. To check for available updates, use the OpenShift Console
or the CLI oc command. Instructions for upgrading a cluster are available
at
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.10/updating/updating-cluster-cli.html
note.title: Details

note.title: Terms of Use

documentdistribution.text: Copyright Â© 2023 Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.

note.text: A denial of service attack was found in prometheus/client_golang. This flaw allows an attacker to produce a denial of service attack on an HTTP server by exploiting the InstrumentHandlerCounter function in the version below 1.11.1, resulting in a loss of availability.
note.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text:
For OpenShift Container Platform 4.10 see the following documentation,
which will be updated shortly for this release, for important instructions
on how to upgrade your cluster and fully apply this asynchronous errata
update:

https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.10/release_notes/ocp-4-10-release-notes.html

Details on how to access this content are available at
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.10/updating/updating-cluster-cli.html

reference.Description: bz#2045880: Denial of service using InstrumentHandlerCounter
